about_the_game:
Welcome to the trial version of BattleCap! We are diligently working towards the full release of the game.

Collect Caps and Engage in Naval Combat

Bid farewell to the rigid controls of traditional naval warfare; BattleCap offers a refreshing experience. With simple controls, you'll be up and running in just a few minutes!

Gather scattered caps, bond them into formidable turrets, and construct a colossal BattleCap that can extend and transform!

Experience the Core Party Gameplay

Completing all the content of the DEMO version takes approximately 10-40 minutes. Players can experience parts of the combat mode and fixed cooperative gameplay.

PVP Mode: Engage in a set configuration of three consecutive PVP battles.

PVE Mode: Participate in a fixed-map, fixed-difficulty PVE campaign.

4 Cap Flagship: More flagships are available to unlock in the full version.

Cap Party (Party PVP Mode): Enjoy a set configuration of three consecutive PVP battles.

In the Party PVP mode, immerse yourself in the intense three-battle tournament, tackling various meticulously crafted map levels.

The choice of BattleCap and random maps will simultaneously dictate your tactical approach—will you charge ahead or develop cautiously?

Also, be prepared for the mid-game mini-games that might spike your blood pressure!

In the trial version, the three-battle configuration is fixed. The full version offers more maps and modes, along with additional three-battle configurations.

Sea Monster Hunting (Cooperative PVE Mode): Play through a fixed-map, fixed-difficulty PVE campaign.

Roguelite Elements: Gather rare blessings and artifacts to enhance your Cap Flagship and embark on an extraordinary naval battle!

Defend the Nymph Camp from waves of enemy attacks!

In addition to solo challenges, you can also invite friends to join in cooperative play, sharing the pressure of the monstrous sea and providing mutual support.

In the trial version, PVE maps and difficulty levels are not selectable. The full version includes a wider range of difficulties, as well as a more diverse array of enemies.

Join BattleCap now and assemble yours!

short_description: This app is the demo version of "BattleCap," where players can enjoy fixed configuration PVP/PVE modes. Collect bottle caps floating on the sea to assemble your own battleship! Engage in thrilling battles with friends or join forces to defeat those furious sea monsters!
